title: Todoist: Planner & Calendar
description:
Trusted by over 47 million people, Todoist is a to do list and a planning center for individuals and teams. Instantly declutter your mind, build habits, and boost your productivity.

With a simple tap, add your daily tasks and set reminders, enjoy multiple views like calendar, list and board, filter activity by work and/or personal life, share notes, collaborate on projects, and achieve peace of mind. 

Why choose Todoist?
‚Ä¢ As a habit tracker, you can add tasks like ‚ÄúPlan next week‚Äôs work every Friday afternoon‚Äù or ‚ÄúDo homework every Wednesday at 6pm‚Äù using Todoist‚Äôs powerful language recognition and recurring dates.
‚Ä¢ Use it as a checklist to reach that mental clarity you‚Äôve been longing for by capturing tasks at the speed of thought.
‚Ä¢ View any project as a list, board or calendar planner to give you ultimate flexibility when planning both your work and time. 
‚Ä¢ Link Todoist with your calendar, voice assistant, and 100+ other tools such as Outlook, Gmail, and Slack.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate on projects of all sizes by assigning tasks to others. Have all your teamwork at hand by adding deadlines, notes, files.
‚Ä¢ Get up and running in no time with templates ranging from a schedule planner to packing lists, meeting agendas and more.
‚Ä¢ Work towards your goals with insights into your personalized productivity trends.

Todoist on Android
‚Ä¢ All the power from Android: task list widget, productivity widget, Quick Add tile, and notifications.
‚Ä¢ Todoist is beautifully designed, simple to get started and intuitive to use. 
‚Ä¢ Stay synced across your phone, tablet, and Wear OS watch, as well as your desktop and other devices.
‚Ä¢ Location-based reminders available on upgrade. Never forget an errand again. 
‚Ä¢ And the best from Wear OS: Day Progress tile and multiple complications.

Questions? Feedback? Visit Visit todoist.com/help

Recommended by:
> The Verge: ‚ÄúSimple, straightforward, and super powerful‚Äù
> Wirecutter: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs simply a joy to use‚Äù
> PC Mag: ‚ÄúThe best to do list app on the market‚Äù
> TechRadar: ‚ÄúNothing short of stellar‚Äù

Use Todoist to plan or track anything:
‚Ä¢ Daily and weekly planner
‚Ä¢ Project management
‚Ä¢ Time management
‚Ä¢ Business planning
‚Ä¢ Grocery list
‚Ä¢ ADHD planner
‚Ä¢ And more

*About Pro plan billing*:
Todoist is free. But if you choose to upgrade to the Pro plan, payment will be charged to your Google Play account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can choose to be billed monthly or yearly. You can turn off auto-renew in your Google Play settings any time after purchase.

title: Wallet: Budget Expense Tracker
description: Wallet is the all-in-one personal finance manager built to help you save money and plan for the future. Connect your bank accounts to track expenses automatically and know where every dollar is going. Dive into in-depth reports on your spending and cash flow to help you effectively manage your money. Wallet allows you to see your finances your way: anywhere, any time. Key Features üîó Connect accounts and manage all things finance in one comprehensive dashboard üí∞ Take control of your money with custom budgets üëÄ Keep track of your monthly bills and subscriptions üìä Monitor your cash flow and balance trend üìà Track stocks alongside your other accounts üí∏ Manage savings to plan for your future üîÆ Get Insightful reports and financial tips üïπ Customize your dashboard to see what matters most to you üì£ Avoid overspending with predictive alerts ü§ù Share accounts and track together with family and friends Your Finances in One Place Wallet is the money manager and bill tracker designed to help you from day one. Unlike other simple budget planners and expense trackers, Wallet provides continuous financial insights. Utilize in depth reports and statistics on all your spending, accounts and investments to gain full control of your finances and always know where you stand. Time to toss your notebooks and spreadsheets, and get empowered to budget for clear, tangible goals that are easy to track in real-time. Whether you need to save money until payday or budget for the long-term, Wallet is flexible for your changing needs. Track your stock portfolio in Wallet and combine your stock holdings with other assets and grow your wealth by building a diversified portfolio of stocks, ETFs and other funds. You can easily control your spending, budget, and save more money using this finance tracker and bill organizer. Switching from another finance app? Export your data from your previous app and easily import it to Wallet to keep your financial history. Take control of your finances with Wallet üîóAutomatic Bank Updates - Track where every dollar is going by seamlessly connecting your accounts. Transactions are automatically and securely synced, then smartly categorized, and factored into your budget. With 3,500 participating banks worldwide, you‚Äôll save loads of time not having to track every penny by tracking all your finances in one place. üí∞Flexible Budgets - Whatever it is you need to accomplish, from paying off debt to buying a car or saving for retirement, this budgeting app offers the flexibility to meet your goals and cleverly react to any changing financial circumstances. With Wallet, budgeting expenses has never been easier. ‚è∞Planned Payments - Never miss a due date with this bill tracker. Organize bills and subscriptions and keep track of due dates. See upcoming payments and how the payments will impact your cash flow. ü§ùSharing selected accounts - Selected accounts can be shared with your spouse, family, friends or colleagues who need to cooperate on a budget. Whether you‚Äôre buying your first home with your partner or managing household costs with roommates, everyone can contribute from any platform. Track your spending together! üìäInsightful reports - Wallet's financial overviews give you actionable insights about the state of your finances, across accounts, cards, debts and cash. Gain insights on where you should be budgeting more or could save more money. üóÇImports or Manual Updates - You can now import all your transaction data from sources of your choice so you will get a full report for simple expense tracking. Be it from your bank or your own spreadsheets. üí±Multicurrency - Multicurrency accounts and worldwide bank coverage makes Wallet the perfect partner for expats, international students and travelers. How to start using Wallet: 1. Download the app 2. Sign In Via Facebook or Google 3. Get going: budget and track expenses like a pro!

Utilize in depth reports and statistics on all your spending, accounts and investments to gain full control of your finances and always know where you stand. Time to toss your notebooks and spreadsheets, and get empowered to budget for clear, tangible goals that are easy to track in real-time.

Whether you need to save money until payday or budget for the long-term, Wallet is flexible for your changing needs. Track your stock portfolio in Wallet and combine your stock holdings with other assets and grow your wealth by building a diversified portfolio of stocks, ETFs and other funds.

You can easily control your spending, budget, and save more money using this finance tracker and bill organizer.

Switching from another finance app? Export your data from your previous app and easily import it to Wallet to keep your financial history.

Take control of your finances with Wallet

üîóAutomatic Bank Updates - Track where every dollar is going by seamlessly connecting your accounts. Transactions are automatically and securely synced, then smartly categorized, and factored into your budget. With 3,500 participating banks worldwide, you‚Äôll save loads of time not having to track every penny by tracking all your finances in one place.

üí∞Flexible Budgets - Whatever it is you need to accomplish, from paying off debt to buying a car or saving for retirement, this budgeting app offers the flexibility to meet your goals and cleverly react to any changing financial circumstances. With Wallet, budgeting expenses has never been easier.

‚è∞Planned Payments - Never miss a due date with this bill tracker. Organize bills and subscriptions and keep track of due dates. See upcoming payments and how the payments will impact your cash flow.

ü§ùSharing selected accounts - Selected accounts can be shared with your spouse, family, friends or colleagues who need to cooperate on a budget. Whether you‚Äôre buying your first home with your partner or managing household costs with roommates, everyone can contribute from any platform. Track your spending together!

üìäInsightful reports - Wallet's financial overviews give you actionable insights about the state of your finances, across accounts, cards, debts and cash. Gain insights on where you should be budgeting more or could save more money.

üóÇImports or Manual Updates - You can now import all your transaction data from sources of your choice so you will get a full report for simple expense tracking. Be it from your bank or your own spreadsheets.

üí±Multicurrency - Multicurrency accounts and worldwide bank coverage makes Wallet the perfect partner for expats, international students and travelers.

How to start using Wallet:

1. Download the app
2. Sign In Via Facebook or Google
3. Get going: budget and track expenses like a pro!
summary: All-in-one personal finance app: Budget, track bills, spend smarter & save money

title: Money Tracker-Expense & Budget
description:
Save money effortlessly! 

Money Tracker is a FREE expense tracker and budgeting app, designed to be the most user-friendly and effective tool on the market. It helps you track spending, save money, plan for the future, and consolidate all your finances in one place.

Money Tracker simplifies finance management! Easily record personal and business transactions, generate spending reports, review daily, weekly, and monthly financial data, and manage your assets using Money Tracker's spending tracker and budget planner.

Discover what sets Money Tracker apart:

üëâ Streamline Your Finances with Our Intuitive Accounting Software
Discover the ultimate simplicity in managing your finances with our intuitive accounting software. Designed to streamline your financial tracking experience, our software offers unparalleled ease of use and efficiency. Whether you're a seasoned accountant or a novice user, you'll find our platform to be the most user-friendly and effective tool on the market. 

üí∏ Utilizing a Double-Entry Bookkeeping Accounting System
Money Tracker facilitates efficient asset management and accounting. It does not just record your money coming in and out of your account but deposits your money into your account as soon as your income is input and draws money from your account as soon as your expense is input.

üìà Organize & Analyze Your Expenses
We'll help you see your finances in the big picture! Imagine your data is automatically categorized, displayed in simple infographics, stylish graphs and clever insights that help you on your way to your dream savings and proper financial health!

üë©‚Äçüéì Optimize Your Spending
Money Manager shows your budget and expenses by a graph so you can see the amount of your expense against your budget quickly and make suitable financial inferences.
Save money for categories you spend the most on by creating budgets and sticking to them! We'll notify you on your progress to make sure you are in green numbers and maintaining positive cash flow.

‚è∞ Scheduled Payments
Never miss a due date with this bill tracker. Organize bills and keep track of due dates. See upcoming payments and how the payments will impact your cash flow.

üí∞ See All Your Money in One Place
Manage multiple accounts together, including your online banking, E-Wallet (e.g. PayPal) or crypto-wallet (e.g. Coinbase) and see your wealth in one place.

Other features: Credit / Debit Card management, Transfer, direct debit and recurrence, Multiple currency support, Automatic cloud sync, Receipt and warranty tracking, Categories and templates, geo-mapping transactions, hash-tagging, Shopping lists, Exports to CSV/XLS/PDF, debt management, PIN security, Standing orders, notifications, reports and more.

MORE KEY FEATURES
üëâ Budgets - My budget book, to help you stick to your financial goals , cost accounting & financial planning
üëâ Wallets & cash book - organize your cash, bank accounts or different financial occasions
üëâ Shared Finances - to efficiently manage money with partners or flatmates
üëâ Multiple Currencies - to handle vacation finances with ease
üëâ Secure Data Sync - to keep your details private, confidential and safe
üëâ Use multiple accounts
üëâ Crunch numbers with the built-in calculator
üëâ Free bill checker & organizer - unlike expensify, money manager,  rocket money, quickbooks, splitwise, or everydollar, it is free.

So, what are you waiting for? Download Money Tracker right now and start managing, tracking, and planning your budget, expenses and personal finances!

title: MyMoney‚ÄîTrack Expense & Budget
description: MyMoney is a personal money manager & budget app that helps you manage money use. This simple finance manager app can help you to track money use, manage budget, understand daily expenses and save money efficiently. MyMoney is not just a spending tracker, it has budget planner, intuitive analysis, effective charts and many helpful features - which make MyMoney a complete personal finance manager app. Use MyMoney and see the differences in your spending habit. How to manage money and track expenses with MyMoney? It's simple, just add an expense record when you are spending somewhere. MyMoney will take care of it. See every dollar you spend to pay a bill, buy a coffee or anything with ease. MyMoney is your ultimate budget planner app that helps you plan monthly budget, achieve your budget goals and save money effectively. Too much spending on coffee? Set a budget on coffee and surely, you would not cross the budget goal. This limits your money use and helps you control your spending behavior. If you really want to track and save your money, MyMoney is the money tracker app that can really make it simple and easier for you. Key features ‚òÖ Customizable Categories Create and customize your own income & expense categories as many as you need. Select preferred category & account icons, titles. Choose your currency sign, decimal place etc. and make it yours. ‚òÖ Budget Planner Plan monthly budget and minimize your expenses. Try not to cross your budget target. ‚òÖ Effective Analysis MyMoney features analysis with various clean charts - Income-expense pie chart, cash flow chart and account contribution bar chart. Take a look on the expense flow to better understand your spending habits. ‚òÖ Multiple Accounts Multiple accounts for managing wallet, cards, savings etc. No limitation on account creation. Track your money with ease. ‚òÖ Simple & Easy MyMoney is designed to be simple and make your money management hassle-free. Its simple and easy-to-use interface will definitely make you love it. ‚òÖ Quick Homescreen Widget MyMoney's smart homescreen widget will help you keep an eye on your balance and add records on the go. ‚òÖ Offline MyMoney is a simple expense manager - fully offline, no internet required to use MyMoney. ‚òÖ Safe & Secured Keep your record data safe with local backups. Restore them if necessary. Export worksheets to print the records. You may consider buying MyMoney Pro here, which has additional features https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.raha.app.mymoney.pro Clarification for permissions: - Storage: Needed only when you create or restore a backup file. - Network Communication (Internet Access): Needed for sending crash reports and improving MyMoney. - Run at startup: Needed for managing reminders.

title: Money Manager Expense & Budget
description:
Money Manager - the #1 financial planning, review, expense tracking, and personal asset management app for Android!

Money Manager makes managing personal finances as easy as pie! Now easily record your personal and business financial transactions, generate spending reports, review your daily, weekly and monthly financial data and manage your assets with Money Manager's spending tracker and budget planner.

* Applying double entry bookkeeping accounting system
Money Manager facilitates efficient asset management and accounting. It does not just record your money coming in and out of your account but deposits your money into your account as soon as your income is input and draws money from your account as soon as your expense is input.

* Budget and expense management function 
Money Manager shows your budget and expenses by a graph so you can see the amount of your expense against your budget quickly and make suitable financial inferences

* Credit / Debit Card management function 
Entering a settlement date, you can see the payment amount and outstanding payment at the asset tab. You can arrange the automatic debit by simply connecting your debit card with your account.

* Passcode 
You can check passcode so you can safely manage your financial review account book with Money Manager

* Transfer, direct debit and recurrence function 
Transfer between assets is possible, which makes your personal and business asset management more efficient. In addition, you can manage you a salary, insurance, term deposit and loan more easily by setting automatic transfer and recurrence.

* Instant statistics 
Based on the data entered, you can instantly see your expense by category and changes between each month. And you can see the change of your assets and income/expense indicated by a graph as well.

* Bookmark function 
You can easily input your frequent expenses all at once by bookmarking them.

* Backup / Restore
You can make and view backup files in Excel file and backup/restore is possible.

* Other functions
- Change of starting date
- Calculator function (Amount > upper right button)
- Sub Category ON-OFF function

* Paid version *
- No Ads.
- Unlimited Assets (In the free version, limited to 15.)
- Edit PC (http://youtu.be/5S4S3EQ3AZE)

You can view ‚Äò‚ÄúMoney Manager‚Äù application using Wi-Fi. You can edit and sort the data by date, category or account group on the screen of your PC. In addition, you can see fluctuations of your accounts indicated on graphs on your PC.

So, what are you waiting for? Download Money Money right now and start managing, tracking, and planning your budget, expenses and personal finances!

title: Money manager & expenses
description: Money manager & expenses app will help you take your budget, money and finances under control and won‚Äôt take much time. It‚Äôs a very convenient budget app that can be used as an expense and income tracker, enabling thorough finance monitoring. You won‚Äôt need to dig through your wallet or check your bank account to be aware of your financial circumstances. With Money manager & expenses app you can easily spend money while hoarding and saving up. Our app provides a comprehensive overview of your finances, acting as a reliable tracker for your budget, income, and expenses, all in one convenient place. Begin managing your money, for as the saying goes, a full wallet makes a light heart. - Clear interface: Money manager & expenses app is very easy to use: you can quickly add a transaction with just a couple of taps, which is ideal for budget tracking or income management; - Illustrative display: The app will automatically draw up current balance and create a pictorial diagram showing your spending patterns (expenses and income); - Explications: Check out detailed reports for each period of time and each category of operation, sort operations by date or amount ‚Äì whatever works best for you. Finance monitoring has never been simpler; - Personalization: Use ready templates (such expenses as grocery, hobby, utility bills, etc.) or create your own categories, choose any colors and entitle them to adjust the app as you see fit and get the most out of it; - Multicurrency: The app supports various currencies and show real-time exchange rates which provides comfort of use while traveling abroad, in case you receive income in foreign currencies, etc.; - Reminders: Create and set reminders of regular payments (gaining income from the business, credit repayments, credit and other bank card payments, debt repayments, etc.) to make sure you don‚Äôt forget anything. Plus, you can set up automatic recurring payments for added convenience, ensuring you never miss a beat; - Safety: Set a passcode to protect data on your budget so that only you have access to this important information.

title: Monefy - Budget & Expenses app
description:
How do you manage your budget and watch every dollar? With Monefy, your financial organizer and finance tracker, it‚Äôs simple. Each time you buy a coffee, pay a bill, or make a daily purchase, you only need to add each expense you have ‚Äî that's it! Just add new records each time you make a purchase. It‚Äôs done in one click, so you don‚Äôt need to fill anything except the amount. Tracking daily purchases, bills, and everything else you spend money on has never been so quick and enjoyable with this money manager.

How do you track your personal expenses successfully? What about your personal capital? 

Let's face it ‚Äî saving money in today's world is not easy. You need a budget. Luckily, Monefy is more than a money tracker, it's also one of the best savings apps to help you with money management. Keep track of your personal expenses and compare them to your monthly income with the budget planner. Keep your monthly budget in mint condition. Your new budgeting app will help you become a budgeting master and start saving money with Monefy. 

Do you own multiple mobile devices? Maybe you want to share budget and expense tracking with a significant other. Monefy helps by safely synchronizing data between multiple devices. Create or change records, add new categories or delete old ones, and the changes will be made on other devices right away!

Key features which make tracking enjoyable and powerful:

- Add new records quickly with the intuitive and easy-to-use interface
- See your spending distribution on an easy-to-read chart, or get detailed information from the records list
- Safely synchronize using your own Google Drive or Dropbox account
- Take control of recurring payments
- Track in multi-currencies
- Access your spending tracker easily with handy widgets
- Manage custom or default categories
- Backup and export personal finance data in one click
- Save money with budget tracker
- Stay secure with passcode protection
- Use multiple accounts
- Crunch numbers with the built-in calculator

Our mission is to empower people to be in control of their lives by bringing awareness of their finances.

Find more information on our website - https://monefy.come

title: Budgeting App - Spend Tracker
description:
The Budgeting App is a simple and easy-to-use budget planner and daily expense tracker designed to simplify your personal finance.

- Sync Devices: Easily jump between devices and stay on top of your spending and financial goals.
- Flexible Budgeting: Adjust your budget to match your pay cycle, whether it‚Äôs monthly, fortnightly, or weekly.
- Custom Categories: Select from a range of charming icons to create and customise categories, making your budget planner truly personal.

- Multiple Accounts: Create multiple accounts with unique budgets, goals, and currencies for comprehensive financial control in your expense tracker.
- Savings & Loan Trackers: Set savings goals or track loan repayments - all in one place to help you stay financially focused.
summary: Budget planner and expense tracker to help manage your personal finance.

title: FinArt: AI Expense Tracker
description:
Discover the ease of managing your finances with Automated Expense Tracker and Family Budget Planner, a cutting-edge app designed to automate your financial tracking. This AI-driven solution simplifies tracking, future planning, and consolidating finances by automatically monitoring expenses, due bills, and account balances from transaction SMS and app notifications. Start with a 5-day free trial and experience firsthand how Automated Expense Tracker keeps you financially informed and in control.

Key AI-powered automated features

Track Expenses Know your Income vs Expenses Plan household budget Get due bill reminders Track active subscriptions Check account balance instantly

Detailed feature list

‚Ä¢ Transaction SMS based Expense Manager This AI-powered Automated Expense Tracker app allows you to manage expenses automatically based on transaction SMS alerts received for each transaction from banks, credit cards and business. SMS based Expense Manager also allows manual entries. ‚Ä¢ Family budget planner Plan household budget, including category wise budget, to save money for life goals such as child education, retirement etc. Family expense tracker with automation simplifies your monthly and daily expense tracking. ‚Ä¢ Automatic Bill reminders Never miss due bills and save money on late payment charges as FinArt will remind you for outstanding bills such as credit card, mobile, utility and many more ‚Ä¢ Personal and business expenses SMS based Expense Manager provides separate profiles for managing personal and business expenses. ‚Ä¢ Track subscriptions SMS based Expense Tracker is AI-powered app which tracks all your premium subscriptions and recurring payments such as Netflix, Amazon Prime, iTunes, Spotify and many more. No more surprise auto debits from your credit cards! ‚Ä¢ Track bank balance Automated Expense Tracker also helps you to automatically check account balance and credit card limit based on transaction SMS alerts ‚Ä¢ Categorization and breakup of your spends like groceries, travel, office, business expenses etc ‚Ä¢ Manage family expenses - Sync expense data across multiple devices in your family with this Automated Expense Tracker ‚Ä¢ Split expenses - Split group expenses, shared expenses and EMIs/ installments ‚Ä¢ Multi currencies ‚Ä¢ Custom start day of the month ‚Ä¢ Ad free experience, forever

Data privacy and security controls

At FinArt, we care a great deal about privacy and security of your expense data while using Automated Expense Tracker. SMS permission is optional and required only if you want to use AI-powered features to automate expense tracking, monitor spend insights, get automatic bill reminders and manage family budget based on SMS inbox analysis. Stop manual tracking of expenses & bills, free-up your mind for more important things in life. Download AI-powered FinArt Automated Expense Tracker now!

title: Fold
description:
To maintain a sincere record of your finances, every rupee and paisa accounted for, is the advice sent down through generations. But because of immovable consistency and considerable will required to follow this advice, only a very few managed to do it and reap the benefits of being in check of their money.

Fold aims at making those benefits accessible to everyone, without any effort required. Every time you make a transaction, for whatever purpose, a reminder to make a note of it, where it‚Äôs spent, on what e.t.c shouldn‚Äôt be hovering over your head all the time. Fold connects to your bank accounts, credit cards and investments to automatically get, tag, add merchants & extract insights without you having to do anything.

Use Fold to:

- Connect your bank accounts and automatically track transactions and balances.
- Add rich metadata to those transactions, like notes, tags, icons, merchant e.t.c.
- Search and Filter transactions, figure out exactly how much you‚Äôve spent and on what in a given duration.
- Connect your credit cards and track real-time usage and transactions.
- Connect your investments to track how well your portfolio is doing.
- Put a rein on your spendings by being aware of where your money is exactly going, and places you can control your spending.
- Check your Cash Flow and compare it with previous months.
- Track accounts of dependents and loved ones so they never have to explicitly ask you for support.

All in all, be on top of your finances as if you‚Äôve hired the smartest personal accountant. Except you‚Äôve not, you‚Äôve just downloaded Fold.

title: Money Manager ÔºöBills & Budget
description:
Our app is the ultimate financial management tool, designed to help you take control of your finances and achieve your financial goals. It is easy to use, packed with features, and has everything you need to manage your money effectively. Whether you want to track your expenses, create a budget, or set up a savings plan, our app has got you covered.

Key Features:
1. Budget Management: Our app makes budgeting easy and efficient. You can set spending limits for different categories, track your progress, and receive alerts when you exceed your budget. With our app, you can stay on top of your finances and achieve your financial goals.

2. Savings Plans: Our app offers multiple savings plans to help you reach your financial goals. Whether you're saving for a vacation, a new car, or a down payment on a house, our app can help you get there faster.

3. Bill Tagging: With our app, you can tag your bills and set up reminders, so you never miss a payment. This will help you avoid late fees and keep your finances in order.

4. Multi-Account Asset Management: Our app allows you to manage multiple accounts and assets in one place. You can track your bank accounts, credit cards, investments, and more, all in one convenient location.

5. Multiple Ledgers: Our app allows you to create multiple ledgers, so you can manage your personal and business finances separately.

6. Comprehensive Categorization: Our app has a comprehensive categorization system that makes it easy to track your expenses and income. You can create custom categories and subcategories, and even import them from other apps.

7. Graphical Analysis: Our app provides graphical analysis of your finances, so you can understand your spending habits and make informed decisions. You can view reports on your income and expenses, track your progress towards your goals, and get insights into your financial behavior.

8. Unlock Password: Our app has a password protection feature to keep your financial data secure. You can unlock the app with a password and keep your financial data safe from prying eyes.

9. Exchange Rate Calculation: Our app provides exchange rate calculation, so you can track your expenses in different currencies and plan your finances accordingly.

10. Reminders: Our app allows you to set up reminders for your bills, expenses, and savings plans. You can choose the frequency of the reminders and customize them to suit your needs.

11. Fun and Cute Design: Our app has a fun and cute design that makes managing your finances a joy. You'll love the colorful graphics and animations, and the intuitive interface makes it easy to use.

Conclusion:
Our app is the ultimate financial management tool, designed to help you take control of your finances and achieve your financial goals. With features like budget management, multiple savings plans, bill tagging, multi-account asset management, comprehensive categorization, graphical analysis, unlock password, exchange rate calculation, reminders, and a fun and cute design, our app has everything you need to manage your money effectively. Download it today and start taking control of your finances!

title: Finch: Expense Tracker, Budget
description:
Tired of tedious manual bookkeeping? Finch AI Bookkeeping makes managing your finances smarter and easier than ever! Finch is a powerful financial management tool that combines AI-powered bookkeeping, multi-ledger support, intelligent expense tracking, and insightful financial analysis to help you effortlessly take control of your personal and business finances.

1. AI-Powered Bookkeeping: Simply send a message to Finch, and our intelligent AI instantly categorizes and records your transactions. No more manual data entry! Finch learns your spending habits and continuously improves its accuracy, saving you time and effort.

2. Multi-Ledger Support: Organize your finances with multiple ledgers for personal, business, family, or any other category you need. Keep your finances neatly separated and easily accessible in one central app.

3. Intelligent Expense Tracking: Monitor your spending with detailed expense tracking by category, date, and more. Visualize your spending patterns with insightful charts and graphs, helping you stay on top of your budget.

4. Multi-Currency Support: Manage your finances in multiple currencies with ease. Finch automatically converts transactions and provides accurate exchange rates, making it perfect for international travelers and businesses.

5. Smart Reports & Charts: Gain valuable insights into your financial health with comprehensive reports and charts. Understand your income, expenses, and net worth at a glance, empowering you to make informed financial decisions.

6. Automatic Backups: Your data security is our top priority. Finch automatically backs up your data to the cloud, ensuring your financial information is always safe and protected.

7. User-Friendly Interface: Finch boasts a clean, intuitive interface that's easy to navigate, even for first-time users. We've focused on creating a seamless and enjoyable user experience.

title: Money+ Cute Expense Tracker
description:
„ÄêInspiration and Ideas„Äë
We believe that true tools are "simple and practical," capable of solving problems effectively and reliably. They should not be limited by internet or location, and should run stably even in signal-free mountains or ships on the high seas. In an era when online applications flourish, we insist on launching this offline accounting software to let tools return to their essence, free from environmental dependencies, and provide only a pure, reliable accounting experience.

„ÄêProduct Features„Äë
Local Storage: Your data is in your hands, safe and worry-free (if you choose to create a Google Drive backup, backup files will be uploaded to your Google Drive space)
Lightning-fast Accounting: Simplified workflows with built-in addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division input methods to make every transaction record faster and more efficient.
Multi-dimensional Account Books: Life, work, travel, children's funds... Create independent account books for each specific scenario with clear records.
Flexible Accounts: Cash, credit cards, virtual accounts... Comprehensive support for detailed management of your every fund.
Personalized Members: Whether personal expenses or family members' (spouse, children, parents) expenses, all can be clearly categorized.
Global Currencies: Support for major international currencies with convenient exchange rate management and conversion.
Budget Master: Flexible budget setting, real-time expense tracking, helping you efficiently control finances and avoid overspending.
Deep Income-Expense Analysis: Provides detailed income-expense reports for specified date ranges. Where every cent goes, what it's used for, which account it comes from, all clearly presented.
Asset Trend Insights: Intuitive display of asset and net asset fluctuations and growth within specific time periods.
Inter-account Transfers: Simulates real money flows, showing attention to detail.
Dream Savings: Set and track your savings goals, helping you gradually achieve your life goals.
Pure Experience: No advertising interruptions, focus on accounting itself.

„ÄêAutomatic Subscription Instructions„Äë

1. Subscription Mode: This application provides monthly or annual automatic renewal subscription services.
2. Subscription Fees: Specific prices and promotional activities are based on the subscription page displayed in the application. Price adjustments will take effect in your next billing cycle.
3. Automatic Renewal and Cancellation: If you do not intend to continue your subscription, be sure to manually turn off automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing cycle to avoid automatic renewal.
4. Free Trial and Refund: If there is a free trial period, it will automatically convert to a paid subscription and charge after the trial period ends. Be sure to cancel the subscription before the trial period ends to avoid charges. Current subscription cycle fees are usually non-refundable.
5. How to Manage Subscriptions: You can manage your subscriptions through the "Subscriptions" page in Google Play Store or refer to relevant guidance within the application.

„ÄêTerms„Äë
Terms of Use: https://www.zotiger.com/terms-of-use-android-en
Privacy Policy: https://www.zotiger.com/zotiger-accountbook-privacy-en

„ÄêContact Information„Äë
Email: service@zotiger.com
